subNavs.title: Feature Overview
subNavs.desc: Grow your courier business by making the shift to Airship

meta.title: Courier Tracking and Delivery Software
meta.desc: The only software you'll need to run your courier business - we got you covered from your bookings to managing your senders, agents, riders and cash.

subNavs.title: Track and Trace
subNavs.desc: Track your packages every step of the way, in real-time

meta.desc: Track packages real-time as your riders and agents update the system through mobile app and web app. Airship covers your workflow from first mile to last mile.

subNavs.title: Booking System
subNavs.desc: Let your customers book and track on their own

meta.title: Branded Booking Site for Senders
meta.desc: Airship offers a booking system where your senders can easily book pickups and deliveries, bulk upload their packages and track packages in real time.

subNavs.title: Dispatch Riders
subNavs.desc: Assign bookings and packages to your riders

meta.title: Dispatch System and Proof of Delivery
meta.desc: Dispatch your bookings and deliveries easily to your agents and riders, in just a matter of seconds with Airship's dispatch dashboard.

subNavs.title: Cash Collections
subNavs.desc: Track cash movements on pickups and deliveries

meta.title: Cash Management
meta.desc: Keep track of all your courier transactions - shipping fees, insurance fees, cash on delivery fees, etc. Offer flexible payment methods to your senders.

subNavs.title: Flexible Pricing
subNavs.desc: Be flexible with your services and pricing

meta.title: Expand your Courier Business
meta.desc: Reach your full potential! Airship supports multiple delivery models, and allows you to expand from your single hub to multiple hubs across the nation.

subNavs.title: Analytics and Reports
subNavs.desc: Stay on top of your business with metrics

meta.title: Analytics and Reports
meta.desc: Monitor your business levers through a single metric dashboard. Export reports and keep track of your top agents and riders, and top senders.

meta.title: Pricing - All-in-one Pricing
meta.desc: Airship offers a simple pricing that grows with you as you grow. Our basic plan already includes all platforms you need to start running your courier business.

meta.title: About - Get to Know Us
meta.desc: Discover how Airship came about, from its humble beginnings as a web development agency all the way to a software built for couriers.
